title: Bangla
details: About 85% of the people in West Bengal speak Bengali. Bengali plays an important role in Kolkata, the capital city of West Bengal. Even so, only a little over half Kolkatas population speaks Bengali. Hindi and English—Indias two official languages—dominate in that city One major difference is word order. Bengali places its verbs either at or near the end of sentences. In English, verbs are usually somewhere in the middle—following the subject, and before the object.

title: Higher Math
details: Students at the Midwood school were initially as taken aback as the little bear was over his missing porridge — when they saw the sheer simplicity of the assignments. But they were savvy enough to realize a good thing when they saw one.

title: Physics
details: Department of Education spokesman Nathaniel Styer didnt directly respond to questions by The Post.
